Now mate or serious material loss is inevitable. 16... P-KR3! drives the QB and kills the mate threat.

Black can play 17... P-R3 [or 17... P-N3] stopping the mate, but after 18 BxB forking Q and R he would be hopelessly behind in material. 17... PxB still falls to 18 QxP mate. 17... R-K1 merely delays it by a move [18 QxP ch K-B1 19 Q-R8 mate.]
Not seeing the threat, he completes the exchange of minor pieces.
The curtain falls.
